content.text: Match ends, Cardiff City 0, Manchester City 2.
Second Half ends, Cardiff City 0, Manchester City 2.
Second yellow card to Joe Bennett (Cardiff City) for a bad foul.
Foul by Joe Bennett (Cardiff City).
Brahim Diaz (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Substitution, Manchester City. Brahim Diaz replaces Bernardo Silva.
